definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Also, cold exposure markedly increased plasma cortisol and plasma catecholamines levels of rats.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷使动物血浆皮质醇和儿茶酚胺含量明显增加。

sentences.english: Is cortisol necessary for severe sepsis or septic shock?
sentences.chinese: 严重脓毒症及感染性休克时是否需用皮质醇？

sentences.english: The adrenal gland dumps cortisol and adrenaline into the blood stream.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺分泌大量的皮质醇和肾上腺素进入血液。

sentences.english: Bypassing bickering was also associated with abnormal rises and falls of the stress hormone cortisol throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 逃避争吵还造成整天压力荷尔蒙皮质醇不正常的升降。

sentences.english: The serum cortisol was detected with ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 放免法检测血清皮质醇浓度。

sentences.english: They’re packed with magnesium, which seems to help keep  cortisol levels low.
sentences.chinese: 他们含有丰富的镁元素，可以降低皮质醇水平。

sentences.english: The adrenal glands of angry or scared people produce cortisol.
sentences.chinese: 当人们害怕或者受惊的时候，肾上腺素会分泌皮质醇。

sentences.english: Stress hormones such as cortisol are also reduced by the simple act of thanking someone.
sentences.chinese: 简单的致谢行为还能减少如皮质醇一类的压力荷尔蒙。

sentences.english: A glut of cortisol triggers weight gain, mostly in the trunk and face.
sentences.chinese: 过多的皮质醇引发体重增加，特别表现在躯干和脸上。

sentences.english: They’re packed with magnesium, which seems to help keep cortisol levels low.
sentences.chinese: 他们含有丰富的镁元素，可以降低皮质醇水准。

sentences.english: “ Cortisol and adrenaline go up and down, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “皮质醇和肾上腺素升高和降低，”他说。

definition: testosterone/abbr. for 睾丸甾酮[gao1 wan2 zai1 tong2]
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)
